name: Vitrici
description:
Gravitate and repel in this mouse-only score attack!

Use the left mouse button to pull yourself to a sphere!
Use the right mouse buttons to push spheres away!

Slam the spheres against enemies to score points!
Slam yourself against enemies to instantly game over!

Premade Assets used:

  • AudioManager was a premade script
  • Death sound: https://freesound.org/people/Jofae/sounds/361636/
  • Other sounds come from a purchased Sound pack
